title: Ping gone up, any ideas why?
body:
Basically, I play with 105/110 constant stable. It was like this for a couple months, and I had no problems playing with this ping.

However, recently it's gone up to 135-145 constant ping. I feel like it was because of the patches but I am curious why it has gone up by 30 lately. Also I can feel a big difference between 105 and 135-145, so it is kinda frustrating. Some help would be appreciated.

Tracing route to 192.64.170.1 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1     7 ms     5 ms     2 ms  192.168.0.1 
  2     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  3    21 ms    23 ms    24 ms  popl-core-2b-xe-814-0.network.virginmedia.net [62.255.66.57] 
  4     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  5     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  6    37 ms    35 ms    20 ms  brnt-ic-1-ae0-0.network.virginmedia.net [62.254.42.198] 
  7    67 ms   153 ms    87 ms  m686-mp2.cvx1-b.lis.dial.ntli.net [62.254.42.174] 
  8    22 ms    21 ms    28 ms  213.46.174.118 
  9    21 ms    18 ms    30 ms  ldn-bb2-link.telia.net [62.115.119.144] 
 10    91 ms    91 ms    89 ms  nyk-bb4-link.telia.net [213.155.133.7] 
 11   142 ms   168 ms   147 ms  chi-b21-link.telia.net [62.115.140.103] 
 12   140 ms   136 ms   136 ms  riot-ic-315569-chi-b21.c.telia.net [62.115.63.66] 
 13   134 ms   138 ms   138 ms  104.160.131.44 
 14   141 ms   138 ms   139 ms  104.160.131.101 
 15     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 16     *        *        *     Request timed out.

 29     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 30     *        *        *     Request timed out.

Trace complete.

replies.body:
Looks like these are the two main points where you connection starts hitting some lag spikes....

7 67 ms 153 ms 87 ms m686-mp2.cvx1-b.lis.dial.ntli.net [62.254.42.174]
11 142 ms 168 ms 147 ms chi-b21-link.telia.net [62.115.140.103]

We could try opening some ports and flushing your DNS by following those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but ultimately this might be an issue with those two nodes not working properly. I'd also suggest reaching out to your ISP to let them know something might be wrong based on that trace data.

Thanks for your reply,

May I ask, how do I open the ports?
Check out those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) I linked under Port Forwarding ^_^!
